Title: Ek Joke Net 2
Writer: Stefan Nieuwoudt, Hannes Brummer, Dries Scholtz, Danie Bester, Melt Sieberhagen (additional writing), Johan Baird (additional writing)
Actors: Solomon Cupido, Hannes Brummer, Lelia Etsebeth, Yolandi Malherbe
Plot: South Africans get pranked for the second time by the candid kings.Testing their reactions in some akward situations.
